title: Modern Diamond Vanki: A Touch of Telugu Elegance
materials: Round Brilliant Cut). Exhibits a subtle Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting sheen.
features: A contemporary take on the traditional Vanki, this bangle features a geometric pattern crafted from elongated gold shapes interspersed with sparkling diamond-studded rounds. The design offers a balance between modern aesthetics and the cultural significance of the Vanki. Each diamond is meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize brilliance.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold with brilliant white diamonds
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
as well as stylish contemporary events.
description: This Vanki seamlessly blends tradition with modern design, making it a versatile piece for any occasion. The high-quality gold and diamonds guarantee lasting value and brilliance. The modern geometric design is striking yet subtle, making it a statement piece without being overwhelming.
